cross_training_opportunities: Train fullstack.dev on advanced security rules and transactions.
contractor_augmentation_option: Hire a senior Firebase backend contractor for 12 weeks.
cost_optimization: High risk of delay. Augmentation is recommended to de-risk timeline.
future_scaling: Current team cannot handle additional backend work without significant delays.

cross_training_opportunities: Pair programming between mobile.dev and frontend.dev on complex native integrations.
contractor_augmentation_option: Flutter specialist available for key sprints (3, 4, 6).
cost_optimization: Delaying non-critical mobile features is an option to manage capacity.
future_scaling: Team is at capacity for mobile work; scaling will require an additional developer.

cross_training_opportunities: Formalize Flutter for Web best practices and share between developers.
contractor_augmentation_option: Not required if backend/mobile is augmented first.
cost_optimization: Manageable with current team, but dependent on other roles not being overloaded.
future_scaling: Capacity for web frontend is tight; scaling will be needed for future epics.
